pages.text: The counter is a simple block that will count redstone pulses and emit a redstone signal when it reaches a certain number. Then it starts over. $(br2)its GUI has two values - 'Counter' (the maximum number it can count up to) and 'Current' (the number it's currently at).

pages.heading: Counter
pages.text: Once Current is equal to Counter, it emits a redstone signal. Another redstone pulse will turn off the signal and reset Counter to 0.
